item.title: Creating Your First Git Repository
item.description: ← Prev Alright, alright, alright! Now that you’ve got Git set up, it’s time to git gud (*Cue sting*). You’re well on your way to becoming a dev

item.title: Setting it all up
item.description: ← Prev Most people skip the configurations, but you - You aren’t most people. You want to be a hackerman extrodinaire.

item.title: Getting Started with Git
item.description: Next → You know how you’re in the coding groove, banging out lines like a maestro, but then you hit a snag and everything goes sideways?
